description:
Welcome to SharePoint 2013. My name is Tom Vorves. I have been teaching people to use SharePoint for more than 12 years, so you can be confident that I will provide you with an insightful learning experience.

SharePoint is Microsoft's web based collaboration tool set, designed to help teams work together on documents and data lists.

SharePoint is a cloud-based collaborative solution for any group, big or small.

Whether you are working as a team or an individual, SharePoint helps you organize information, people and projects. If you're connecting across an enterprise or within a small group - use SharePoint to engage with people, share ideas and reinvent the way you work together.

When the time comes for you to use a SharePoint feature, you may remember the concept but perhaps have forgotten the steps. Watch my How-To videos. They provide quick reminders to help you remember the steps to use a SharePoint feature.

In this series of videos you will learn to work with SharePoint in 6 areas

  • Learn why SharePoint is Becoming so Popular
  • How to Navigate the SharePoint Environment
  • Use Lists, the Building Blocks of SharePoint
  • Use Libraries for Storage and Management of Documents
  • Build Web Pages to Present Your Lists and Libraries
  • Applying Site Permissions
  • Amazing Bonus 'How-To' Videos

Visit www. tomvorves .com for questions and links to other classes on Udemy

Now go start learning Sharepoint!
title: SharePoint 2013 for Site Owners and Contributors
